title: How Bitcoin Usage Could Skyrocket Thanks To Zero-Knowledge Proofs
author: David Tse
description: Novel technology utilizing zero-knowledge proofs (ZKP) could solve this conundrum, finally enabling true Bitcoin smart contracts.

title: Meet @Fiatjaf, The Mysterious Nostr Creator Who Has Lured 18 Million Users And $5 Million From Jack Dorsey
author: Michael del Castillo
description: Disenchanted with his online options, the reclusive programmer tells Forbes how he designed a chat-and-payment service for people who dislike corporate control. Twitter co-founder Jack Dorsey has donated more than $5 million because he likes the idea.

title: Getting Started In Bitcoin: Easy Bitcoin Wallets For Beginners
author: Mickey Koss
description: Bitcoin is a digital asset native to the Bitcoin Network and can be stored in Bitcoin wallets. Learn the difference between custodial and non-custodial wallets here.

title: How The Bitcoin Ecosystem Works
author: Nina Bambysheva
description: Understand how the Bitcoin ecosystem works, and the importance of upgrades

title: Bitcoin Education-What I Learned Teaching A Bitcoin Class In Texas
author: Korok Ray
description: Bitcoin education is still the largest barrier to bitcoin adoption. Using bitcoin responsibly requires both financial literacy and computer science skills. This also presents the industry’s greatest opportunity.

title: Inside Tether, Crypto’s (So Far) Unbreakable Buck
author: Steven Ehrlich
description: Amid crypto’s existential crisis, its largest liquidity provider, Tether, has withstood multiple multi-billion dollar redemption runs. Will competition from rival stablecoins like USDC and regulatory pressure force Tether to finally come clean?

title: Bitcoin Trailblazer Raises Capital To Create Interplanetary Cryptocurrency
author: Michael del Castillo
description: LedgerX founding CEO Paul Chou is building on the sale of the company he created to FTX by creating a new kind of cryptocurrency, Foundation Coin, that can be spent on Earth, the Moon, Mars and beyond.

title: Bitcoin The Digital Bearer Asset: Demystifying Self Custody, Private Keys
author: Mickey Koss
description: As Wall Street firms race for bitcoin ETF approval, bitcoin advocates urge participants to consider self-custody as a lower cost alternative.

title: ‘It’s Definitely Going To Happen’—Prince Makes Shock Crypto Prediction Amid Bitcoin And Ethereum Price Rebound
author: Billy Bambrough
description: The hereditary Prince of Serbia has said it's only a matter of time before "every country" eventually adopts bitcoin...
